title: A BiVO4/Bi2Mo2O9 heterostructure towards oriented charge transfer for efficient photoelectrochemical water oxidation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4263-4271
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00734D, Paper
Yuli Xiong, Nan Zhou, Yuting Zhou, Bo Peng, Yuting Cui, Peng Yu, Zhenxiang Cheng
A BiVO4/Bi2Mo2O9 heterostructure is prepared by the SILAR method, demonstrating 3.4 times higher photocurrent compared to Bi2Mo2O9 due to oriented photogenerated hole transfer.
